metadata.dc:author: Navarro Beltrán, P
De la Cueva Barrao, L
Añaños Jiménez, M
Sáez Comet, L
Arroyo Palomera, E
Abós Olivares, D
metadata.dc:description: Sarcoidosis of bone lesions are rare, with an overall incidence of 3-9% of the cases. When they do occur, they are more frequent in the small bones of hands and feet than in long bones, spine or skull. We report a case of a male patient with sarcoidosis with multiple enlarged lymph nodes, skin and bone lesions, and the scintigraphic findings.
metadata.dc:title: Sarcoidosis ósea. Hallazgos en la exploración con citrato de Galio.
[Sarcoidosis of bone. Findings in the Gallium citrate examination].
